familyMemberEthics.description: Former director/president of TIGL Ireland Enterprises Limited (Trump International Golf Links - Doonbeg), of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $14,184,974 in golf related revenue income from TRUMP INTERNATIONAL GOLF LINKS - DOONBEG, valued at $25,000,001 - $50,000,000. Underlying Assets: golf course and resort. Location: Doonbeg, Ireland. See attached schedule.
